formdata.value:
Dear Gumtree User, I am Steven Berry. I am a Kitchen Hand with over two and a half years recent industry experience. I would like to apply for the Casual “Help needed for house hold work” position you listed on Gumtree. I am available full time untill August. I possess a very fast, efficient working pace, a positive attitude and most importantly I have the desire to become even better, faster, more efficient and to learn as much and as many new skills as possible. I understand that no two kitchens are the same and I have many questions about your system and the first thing I plan on doing is learning the fridges well. I live just 2 kilometres away from your workplace in Stirling.
 I have completed the following hospitality training courses:
 
•         West Australian Responsible Service of Alcohol (RSA)
•         Barista Training
•         SITXFSA101 – Use Hygienic Practices for Food Safety
 
I also possess the following desirable attributes:
 
•        High organizational skills
•        Own Reliable Vehicle
•        Full Australian Citizenship
•        Ability to speak perfect English
 
I can be contacted on 0481 941 601 or at stevenberry305@gmail.com if interested, thank you for this opportunity.
